text: The 1002nd Ruse () is a 1915 Russian silent comedy movie directed by Yevgeny Bauer.Тысяча вторая хитростьТысяча вторая хитрость (1915) It stars Lina Bauer, S. Rassatov, and Sergei Kvasnitsky. == Actors == * Lina Bauer as The Cunning Wife * S. Rassatov as The Husband * Sergei Kvasnitsky as Wife's Lover == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1915 movies
title: The 1002nd Ruse
